description: Kandelo Cocktails celebrates the rich tradition of Pacific ancestral drinks. With over 15 years of experience, they craft unique, medicinal beverages using biche and local herbs, aiming to heal and enhance well-being. Their commitment to quality and cultural heritage has garnered recognition, including awards and international interest. They produce a variety of products, including creams and cocktails, and are committed to maintaining the essence of their traditional recipes while exploring opportunities for international expansion.
name: Cocteles Kandelo
